SouthWest Energy Ltd bụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha na mmepụta mmanụ na gas nke Ethiopia nke dị na Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
Tewodros Ashenafi guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'afọ 2005.  E debanyere aha ya na Hong Kong.
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2005, SouthWest Energy bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta mmepụta na Ministry of Mines and Energy nke Ethiopia maka blọk 9 na 13 na Ogaden Basin

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008, ọ bịanyere aka na blọk 9A, na-eweta ngụkọta  ala ruo uare kilomita 29,000 (11,000 sq mi).  ụlọ ọ ọrụ ahụ na-ezube iweta $100 nde site na ntinye onwe ya na nkeji mbụ nke 2013 iji nyere aka kwado mmemme igwu mmiri nke ọma atọ na Basin Ogaden..  Na mgbakwunye, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ala na Gambella na Jijiga.
